Summary: Bright, shape-shifting object stationary in night's sky.
divs: sighting detailsduring my evening walk, i spotted this object approximately five miles high in the western sky. i have seen this same object in the same location at the same times for approximately two weeks prior to this report. it did not move from its location, was brighter and seemingly lower than anything else in the entire sky. to the naked eye, it appears to be a flying saucer. when viewed in photographs, it takes many different shapes. i, personally, am not afraid of aliens and\or ufos, but i got the distinct impression that "it" did not like being photographed. as of the submission of this report, it is still in the sky.
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Boca Raton
There were no other sightings in Boca Raton on or around July 1st 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Shape: Circle, Disc, Oval, Saturn-like, Star-like, Other, Unknown
